     微信支付智慧商圈API

    thinsstar

      • notifyPoints

        void notifyPoints(PointsNotifyRequest request)
           throws WxPayException
         智慧商圈接口-商圈积分同步API
 文档详见: https://pay.weixin.qq.com/wiki/doc/apiv3/wxpay/businesscircle/chapter3_2.shtml

        参数:
        request - 请求对象
        抛出:
        WxPayException - the wx pay exception
